articles.title: Watch first images from the 1-inch phone camera menace that promises to destroy iPhone and Galaxy S23 Ultra - PhoneArena
articles.description: This will be the first phone with a 1-inch type sensor in the Western world, a sensor much larger than the one used in the iPhone 14 Pro Max and Galaxy S23 Ultra...
